title.rendered: OUR FAVOURITE PAINT COLOURS FOR CHILDREN’S BEDROOM

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our favourite paint colours for children’s bedroom” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Ready to renovate your children’s bedroom or want to create a bedroom when starting a family? The Good Painter have rounded up 7 of our favourite paint colours for a child-friendly space to encourage positivity, calmness and optimism! Inspire and experiment with these colour selections fit for a boy or girls room in your London home. Our painters and decorators guarantee you’ll find the perfect fit to start your painting project today! If you are looking for residential painters and decorators to help assist with your refurbishment and painting project, make sure to visit our services and enquire. Without further ado, let us explore the range of paint colours to create an impeccable bedroom to make your child ecstatic![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”1.Dayroom Yellow – Farrow & Ball” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6307″][vc_column_text]Farrow & Ball[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1598537973062{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]Yellow is the favourite neutral-colour that works beautifully in any room, especially as it is a lively and bright shade to represent the sunshine and sun glow. Dayroom Yellow by Farrow & Ball is the ideal shade to reflect natural sunlight and all-in-all portray a beaming and joyful display for your child. This paint colour will work wonderfully as a statement wall or even on painted furniture to change things up a bit. Make sure to check out our blog post on how to paint your wooden furniture perfectly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”2. Hidey Hole – Little Greene” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6309″][vc_column_text]Little Greene Paint Company[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Who doesn’t want to be surrounded in an adventurous and natural scene representing the exterior? Hidey Hole is the peaceful, light green which fits wonderfully in your space and allows your inspiration to flourish! Produce a fantastic and imaginative room for your children with green and encourage a healthy atmosphere in your home![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”3. Lavender – Edward Bulmer” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6310″][vc_column_text]Edward Bulmer[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This striking smokey mauve from Edward Bulmer creates a pretty and charming bedroom fit for a girl, especially in a monochromatic scheme. Our painters and decorators recommend to pair this paint colour and adding a statement wall with the Aesops Fables wallpaper by Sanderson. Create a magical and dreamy environment with this timeless, dusky shade.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”4. First Dawn – Dulux UK” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6311″][vc_column_text]Dulux UK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]One of our favourite colours due to its versatility, portrayal and meaning. This gorgeous sky-like blue from Dulux is called First Dawn and is the perfect shade and paint colour for a children’s bedroom. Build an environment which is relaxing, tranquil and gentle for your little one, while splendidly working with the lighting. First Dawn is definitely one of the picks for an enchanting bedroom.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”5. Fruit Shake – Benjamin Moore” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6312″][vc_column_text]Benjamin Moore[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Fruit Shake is that extraordinary shade which illuminates the space with its soft, gentle femininity energy. Create a pleasantly pink and positive environment with this creamy shade, not too bright and not overly saturated, just right! Pink is a cheerful and charming colour full of compassion. Are you looking to find more positive colours? We have a blog post with our top positive shades, so make sure to stay content![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”6. Verdigris Green – Farrow & Ball” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6313″][vc_column_text]Farrow & Ball[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]For anyone looking for a brighter and more daring paint colour, our painters and decorators haven’t forgotten about you. Verdigris Green is from Farrow & Balls Colour by Nature palette and creates a room which is lively and tropical. This rich blend will fit a neutral colour scheme, so it is not too overbearing for your child. If you are looking to experiment and construct the ideal colour scheme, visit Color Designer and get inspired.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”7. Ice V – Paint & Paper Library” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”6314″][vc_column_text]Paint & Paper Library[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Finally, the Ice V from Paint & Paper Library will conclude our favourite paint colours list. This icy blue works beautifully on your children’s bedroom walls, paired with a darker shade for woodwork and trims. Create a versatile and fun space with this paint colour; we love the simplicity and how it is the perfect base for endless inspiration and ideas!

Find any ideal shades for your children’s bedroom? The Good Painter love sharing our selections and tips through our blog posts and Instagram page! If you are interested in our services and need a painting and decorating job complete, make sure to contact our London painting and decorating company today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
